recorder.micErrorDesc: Could not access microphone. Please check permissions.
recorder.audioTooShort: Audio too short. Please record at least 5 seconds with clear voice.
recorder.audioNotAvailable: Error: audio not available. Please record again.
recorder.consentLabel: I declare that I have the consent of all participants to record and process this meeting, in compliance with GDPR.

processing.completedDesc: Your meeting note has been successfully analyzed

email.subject: Subject

apiKeys.title: API Keys Management
apiKeys.description: Manage all API keys used in the application. View, validate and update keys securely.
apiKeys.securityNote1: All actions with API keys are logged for security audit
apiKeys.securityNote2: Never share your API keys with unauthorized third parties
apiKeys.securityNote3: If you suspect a key has been compromised, replace it immediately
apiKeys.revealConfirmDescription: This action will be logged in the audit logs. Are you sure you want to reveal this key?
apiKeys.editKeyDesc: Enter the new value for this API key. The change will take effect immediately.
apiKeys.editWarning: ⚠️ This action will be logged and the key will be updated immediately.

controlPanel.title: Admin Control Panel
controlPanel.dangerWarning: These actions are irreversible. Use with extreme caution. All actions are logged for audit purposes.
controlPanel.deleteUsersDesc: Permanently delete all users except administrators. This cannot be undone.
controlPanel.deleteDepartmentsDesc: Permanently delete all departments and their associated emails.
controlPanel.deleteMeetingsDesc: Permanently delete all meeting notes across the entire system.
controlPanel.factoryResetDesc: Delete ALL data: users (except admins), departments, and meetings. This is the nuclear option.
controlPanel.confirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the selected data from the system.
controlPanel.confirmWarning: WARNING: This will delete ALL user data except admin accounts!

myMeetingsFilters.clearViewDesc: This will hide all your current meetings from your view. Don't worry - no data is permanently deleted. Administrators can still access all historical data for audit and compliance purposes.
myMeetingsFilters.viewClearedDesc: Your view has been cleared. Data is still accessible to admins.

renewals.title: Service Renewals
renewals.subtitle: Manage your service renewal dates
renewals.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected service(s)? This action cannot be undone.
renewals.importSubtitle: Upload documents to automatically extract renewal information
renewals.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, PNG, JPG, CSV, XLS, XLSX
renewals.clearConfirmDesc: This action will PERMANENTLY delete all services and renewals from your account. This action cannot be undone! Use this button only before reimporting corrected data.
renewals.clearSuccess: ✅ Data cleared successfully! You can now reimport the corrected file.
renewals.dragDropOrClick: Drag & drop a file here, or click to select
renewals.providerInfoDesc: Service provider name, type (domain, hosting, VPS, etc.), and service name
renewals.renewalDatesDesc: Automatically detects dates in various formats (DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, text dates)
renewals.clientInfoDesc: Extracts client name if mentioned in the document
renewals.renewalCycleDesc: Annual, monthly, biennial, or other billing cycles
renewals.criticalItemsDesc: Services that are expired or expiring soon
renewals.allClearDesc: No expired or critical renewals at this time
renewals.expiredServicesDesc: These services have passed their renewal date
renewals.renewalPeriodQuestion: For how many years do you want to renew this service?
renewals.renewalPeriodNote: The new date will be calculated from the original renewal date:
renewals.manageClientsDesc: Manage your clients and their status
renewals.addNewClientDesc: Create a new client to associate with services
renewals.name: Name
renewals.settingsDesc: Configure default alert settings and email templates
renewals.alertSystemDesc: Alerts are sent automatically every day at 9:00 AM
renewals.sendAlertsNowDesc: Click to test immediate sending of pending alerts
renewals.noPendingAlerts: No pending alerts to send at this time
renewals.alertsProcessed: Processed {{total}} alerts, but none were sent successfully
renewals.alertConfigDesc: Set how many days before expiry you want to receive alerts
renewals.alertOffsetDesc: Alerts will be sent {{days}} days before the renewal date
renewals.recipientsDesc: Comma-separated email addresses. These will receive all renewal alerts by default.
renewals.emailTemplateDesc: Customize the email template for renewal alerts (optional)

voiceNote.title: Voice Note - Summary
voiceNote.subtitle: Record or upload a personal voice note

upload.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: MP3, WAV, WEBM, OGG, M4A
upload.minDuration: The file appears to be empty or corrupted
